83829.「メギストリスの城から盗んだ 古文書によれば\n この部屋のどこかに……:
According to that ancient manuscript we stole
from Megistris Castle, it's somewhere in this
room...

83831.「うん……？ なんだ おまえは！？\n 俺様の邪魔を するつもりなら\n ただじ:
Huh? Who the heck are you?! If ya don't
fancy bein' best friends with the end of me
axe, then I'd best skedaddle if I were you!

83832.「まいった！\n だが とどめは ささないでくれ！: I...I give! Uncle! Just let me go, won't ya?!

83833.「あんたが強いのは よーくわかった！\n 子分のことなら 煮ても焼いてもかまわね:
I get it, yer the strongest! Do whatever ya
want to me henchman! Just spare me!
Pleeeease!

83834.「ひでえや おかしら！: 'ow could you say such a thing?!

83836.「俺様は 月の秘宝を手に入れるって夢を\n どうしても かなえなくちゃならねえ！:
I got dreams of nabbin' that Treasure of the
Moon! That's why I stole this fancy little
manuscript!

83837.「古文書は 用が済んだら返すから\n どうか 俺様を\n 許してくれよ！ な！:
I'll return it when I'm done, I swear!
You'll let me go, right? Right?!<yesno><close>

83838.「そんなこと いわずにさ。\n 俺様を 許してくれよ！ な！ な！<yesno>:
I'll go straight, I promise!
Just let me go, pleeeeeease?<yesno><close>

83840.「……よーし。\n それじゃ この古文書どおり\n キラキラ大風車塔を 動かすぜ:
Alrighty... So now I gotta get this big o'
windmill movin'!

83841.「えーっと 操作方法は ５５ページ……。\n ん？ なんだこりゃ。:
Ummmm... How to operate... Page 55...
Eh? What's this now?

83842.「どうしたんですかい？ おかしら。: What's the matter? Somethin' wrong, boss?

83843.「なんでえ！ カンジンの５５ページが\n 破れちまって ないじゃねえかっ！:
H-hey! That page is super important and it's
been torn out! Where the heck is it?!

83844.「おいっ！\n 今すぐ ５５ページを見つけてくるか\n 俺様に ブン殴られるか:
Oi, you! Ya better get movin' and find that
page for me, or you'll be gettin' the
clobberin' of a lifetime, ya hear?!

83847.「おかしらには もう ついていけねえよ！\n あっしは カンダタ団を 抜けますぜ:
I can't sit here and deal with any o' this
anymore! I'm leavin' the Robbin' 'Ood Gang!

83848.「あっ てめえ！ どこへ逃げる気だ！？\n 待ちやがれい！！:
Why, you lousy little...! Where do ya think
yer goin'? Wait fer me!!

83849.「待ってたんだなー。\n オイラたちの偽物は 見つかったのかー？:
I've been waitin' for ya.
Well? Did you find our impostors?

83850.<pc>は ボラオに\nメギストリス城に現れたという偽物は\nカンダタだったこと:
<pc> told Borao that the imposter who
had appeared at Megistris Castle was
none other than Robbin' 'Ood!

83853.「やべぇ！ オレ 気分がダウナーすぎる……。\n カンダタさんといえば 盗賊中の:
Oh, man! This is NOT good... Robbin' 'Ood is THE thief among thieves! He doesn't shed tears, or bloodーheck, he barely wears any
clothes! He's quite the fearsome fellow...

83854.「オレたち カンダタさんの名前をパクって\n ダンダダ団って 名乗ってる。\n:
We've stolen his name and call ourselves the
Robbin' 'Ood Gang... If this gets out, he's
gonna send us on a one-way trip to hell!

83855.「隠れてえ。マジ 隠れてえ……。\n ていうか すべてを 忘れてえ。:
I'm gonna hide...yeah, that's what I'll do.
Better yetーI'll just forget this all
happened.

83856.「バロのアニキ！ ボクたちダンダダ団が\n 大盗賊カンダタさんと 名前が似ている:
Baro! We can just say that our name being the
same as his is just one big coincidence!

83857.「ボクたち ダンダダ団の名称は\n 実在の盗賊とは いっさい関係ありませんって\:
If we're insistent enough that our gang's
name has nothin' to do with thieves at all,
then we should be in the clear!

83858.「マジ それで いくしかねえ……。:
Seriously? Well, I guess there's really no
other way...

83859.「おいっ テメー。\n 今後 オレらの前で カンダタさんの名前を\n クチに出し:
Hey, you. Mention Robbin' 'Ood's name in front
of us again and you'll be gettin' a good
walloping. Dead serious! Keep it to yourself!

83860.「えーっと でも 偽物が逃げたんなら\n また ケーキを買いに 行けるんだなー。:
Um, well...if the impostors ran off, then I
can go back and buy a cake. I suppose
I'm good with that.

83861.「ありがとうー 助かったぞー。\n これは お礼なんだなー。受け取ってくれー。:
Thanks, you've been a big help!
I guess I should thank you. Here, take it!

83862.「それにしても 大盗賊カンダタが\n 探してる 月の秘宝って なんだー？\n き:
By the way, what is this so-called Treasure
of the Moon that Robbin' 'Ood's lookin'
for? I'm sure it must be something tasty.

84805.「さ……さっきから聞いてりゃ\n あんまりにも あんまりじゃないですか！:
D...don't ya think you're goin' a bit too
far with this?

91119.「ああー ハラペコになってきたー。\n 今日からは 毎日 オルフェアの町に\n:
Ohhh...I'm gettin' real hungry. Startin'
today, I'm gonna head over to Orphea every
day and buy a cake!
